verses.verse: (For the choir director; upon an eight-stringed lyre. A Psalm of David.) <S%H3467>Help,<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for the <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>man<s%> <S%H1584>ceases<s%> to be, For the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6461>disappear<s%> from among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

They <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>falsehood<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another;<s%> With <S%H9142>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and with a <S%H3820>double<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> they <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
<S%H834>Who<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> "With our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> we will <S%H1396>prevail;<s%> Our <S%H8193>lips<s%> are our own; <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H113>lord<s%> over us?"

<S%H4480>"Because<s%> of the <S%H7701>devastation<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H603>groaning<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> I will <S%H6965>arise,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> "I will <S%H7896>set<s%> him in the <S%H3468>safety<s%> for which he <S%H6315>longs.<s%>"

The <S%H565>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H565>words;<s%> As <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H6884>tried<s%> in a <S%H5948>furnace<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H2212>refined<s%> <S%H7659>seven<s%> <S%H7659>times.<s%>
Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> wilt <S%H8104>keep<s%> them; Thou wilt <S%H5341>preserve<s%> him from <S%H2098>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1980>strut<s%> about on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> When <S%H2149>vileness<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
